name: vscode-catch2-test-adapter
displayName: Catch2 Test Explorer for Visual Studio Code
description: Run your Catch2 tests in the Sidebar of Visual Studio Code
author: Mate Pek

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build

configuration.title: Configuration for the Catch2 Test Explorer extension

catch2TestExplorer.executables.description: The location of your test executables (relative to the workspace folder or absolute path) and with a lot of other setting.

catch2TestExplorer.defaultEnv.description: Default environment variables to be set when running the tests, if it isn't provided in 'executables'. (Resolves: ${workspaceFolder})

catch2TestExplorer.defaultCwd.description: The working directory where the test is run (relative to the workspace folder or absolue path), if it isn't provided in 'executables'.  (Resolves: ${workspaceFolder})

catch2TestExplorer.defaultWorkerMaxNumbe.description: The variable maximize the number of the parallel test execution per file, if it isn't provided in 'executables'.

catch2TestExplorer.globalWorkerMaxNumber.description: The variable maximize the number of the parallel test execution.

catch2TestExplorer.enableSourceDecoratio.description: Sets the source code decorations: Errored lines will be highlited.
